text: *Oops, I mean fixing!
author: l_stone

text: Ontario just announced the “Fix the Hydro Mess Act,” which overhauls the Ontario Energy Board (to which Ford’s former principal secretary Jenni Byrne was recently appointed) #onpoli
author: l_stone

text: Laura Kirby-McIntosh with Ontario Autism Coalition strikes a positive tone on @MacLeodLisa announcement, says it takes courage to make changes. But she says she still has concerns about age restrictions and funding caps #onpoli
author: l_stone

text: If you’re still digesting the 102-page integrity commissioner’s report into Ron Taverner’s OPP appointment (which cleared Premier Ford of wrongdoing), this text exchange between frmr cabinet secretary and chief of staff Dean French is being referenced quite a bit today #onpoli
author: l_stone

text: The NDP weighs on in what the party hopes is in MacLeod's 10 am autism announcement #onpoli

author: l_stone

text: NEW: @MacLeodLisa is expected to announce “enhancements” to Ontario’s #autism program today at 10 am - whether that means more money or funding changes, TBD #onpoli
author: l_stone

text: #BREAKING: @MacLeodLisa expected to announce “enhancements” to Ontario’s autism program - earlier this week she told @JohnFraserOS “We’re going to make sure that where we can make some enhancements, we’ll do that.” #onpoli
author: l_stone

text: JUST IN: @MacLeodLisa is making an announcement at 10 am at Queen’s Park. This could be significant news. #onpoli
author: l_stone

text: Incredible interview with ⁦@janephilpott⁩: “If nothing wrong took place, then why don’t we waive privilege on the whole issue and let those who have something to say on it speak their minds and share their stories?” #cdnpoli

text: Looking forward to chatting with @AnneMarieAMK soon on @YourMorning about all-night votes in Ottawa and @MPCelina’s decision to leave the Liberal caucus #cdnpoli

text: Ford did not break rules in hiring Taverner, integrity commissioner rules, but calls process ‘flawed’ #onpoli
author: l_stone

text: When I spoke to @MPCelina for this piece, she was adamant about staying on as a Liberal MP for next few months, "unless they decide to boot me out of caucus."  Today, the PM said she quit. (She has not yet responded as to why.) #cdnpoli
author: l_stone

text: However, Premier Ford leaves out the integrity commissioner's comments about some "troubling aspects" of the recruitment process which ultimately made the process "flawed." #onpoli
author: l_stone

text: NEW: Statement from ⁦@fordnation⁩ about the integrity commissioner’s report; he’ll also be taking Qs at 3:30 pm #onpoli
author: l_stone

text: In my recent @janephilpott story, @MPCelina comments: “A lot of women in our caucus are making themselves vocal on a number of different issues....Jane has been able to say things that I think needed to be said, but people are afraid to say it." #cdnpoli
author: l_stone

text: Ford did not break rules in hiring Taverner, integrity commissioner rules, but calls process ‘flawed’ #onpoli  https://www.theglobeandmail.com/canada/article-ford-did-not-break-rules-in-hiring-taverner-integrity-commissioner/ …

text: Wow.
author: l_stone

text: Just announced: NDP leader @theJagmeetSingh wrote a memoir, called "Love & Courage: My Story of Family, Resilience, and Overcoming the Unexpected." It's coming out on April 23, according to Simon & Schuster Canada #cdnpoli
author: l_stone

text: Ontario Integrity commissioner: "The Premier stayed at arm’s length from the recruitment process and...he believed it to be independent. However, I found that there were some troubling aspects of the recruitment process and ultimately made the finding that the process was flawed"
author: l_stone

text: #BREAKING: Ontario’s integrity commissioner dismisses allegations of conflict of interest against Premier Doug Ford in Ron Taverner OPP appointment; says he has “concerns about the process that led to the recommendation of the final selection panel” #onpoli
author: l_stone

text: Must-read interview with SNC-Lavalin CEO from @NickVanPraet & @willis_andrew: “The biggest impact of SNC-Lavalin not doing business in Canada is Ontario, not Quebec. It’s Ontario." #cdnpoli #onpoli
author: l_stone

text: “Nobody appears to give a crap about whether we fail or not in Canada." SNC-Lavalin CEO Neil Bruce: ‘We want to put this behind us' /via @globeandmail https://www.theglobeandmail.com/business/article-snc-lavalin-ceo-neil-bruce-we-want-to-put-this-behind-us/?utm_medium=Referrer:+Social+Network+/+Media&utm_campaign=Shared+Web+Article+Links …
author: l_stone

text: “We need to make sure that students have an environment whereby they’re communicating, they’re learning how to discuss difficult subject areas, and working through with people,” Thompson says.
author: l_stone

text: Thompson said she was told a story by an employer that a bright young person was so uncomfortable in an interview they were reduced to tears.  “They haven’t had that exposure, the coping skills, to deal with stressful situations,” she said.
author: l_stone

text:
Asked today about her comments about bigger high school class sizes building resiliency, Education Minister @LisaThompsonMPP says in consultations with employers, government was told new hires were “lacking resiliency and coping skills.” 
#onpoli
author: l_stone

text: Without having viewed the site myself last week, I cannot say for sure it was live online at that time. But there appears to be no formal complaint to the authorities from the PCs about this. And NDP back-end screen grab seems to confirm it was going up.
author: l_stone

text: Horwath repeatedly calls Ford's chief of staff (Dean French) his "hand-picked chief of staff." Is there any other kind?
author: l_stone

text: Premier Ford is again repeating in the legislature that the NDP only posted information about their upcoming fundraiser 4 days in advance (contravention of rules); yesterday NDP provided screen grabs of a back-end website & internal comms saying they were posting it last Thursday
author: l_stone

text: I asked the Integrity Commissioner’s office (also Ontario’s lobbyist registrar) whether it’s looking into this. They said they don’t confirm whether a complaint has been received or if an investigation is taking place. Investigations are summarized in annual reports #onpoli
author: l_stone

text: Sen. Lynn Beyak broke Senate’s code of conduct by posting racist letters about Indigenous people online, ethics officer says #cdnpoli
author: l_stone

text: Huh.
author: l_stone

text: (I don’t know specifically what this refers to as I wasn’t following the debate, but presumably involves foul language.)

text: NDP MPP ⁦@maritstiles⁩ has apologized to PC MPP ⁦@DaveSmithPtbo⁩ for using language in a debate she says she regrets #onpoli
author: l_stone

text: On a national pharmacare plan, Fedeli calls it “a lot of talk and no action.” Says the feds have no intention of following through.
author: l_stone

text: “We will not allow Ottawa to undermine Ontario’s wellbeing,” Fedeli says.
author: l_stone

text: Now Fedeli is on the topic of U.S tariffs on Canadian steel and aluminum - says feds haven’t taken “effective action” to press the U.S. to remove them
author: l_stone

text: Fedeli says he’s disappointed that the feds don’t share Ontario’s “open for business” messags. Goes after carbon tax, federal transfer payments #onpoli
author: l_stone

text: Ontario Finance Minister ⁦@VicFedeliMPP⁩ is now commenting on the federal budget. Asks reporters about the situation in Ottawa, “Is it still going?” When told the Conservatives staged a walk out, he tells us, “As long as you don’t here.”
author: l_stone

text: Without being able to see screen grabs first-hand, Premier's office stands by its assertion NDP fundraiser wasn't posted online last Friday. (The grabs simply show a back-end address for site.)  Ford's office accuses NDP of "blatant hypocrisy" for its "cash-for-access" fundraiser
author: l_stone

text: The Ontario NDP has just provided screen grabs showing Saturday's @AndreaHorwath fundraising event was going live to the NDP website last Thursday (within financing rules.) “Doug Ford is making stuff up again," said Lucy Watson, provincial secretary of the Ontario NDP. #onpoli
author: l_stone

text: Ontario’s post-secondary Minister ⁦@DrFullertonMPP⁩ just announced some measures to address sexual violence on campus #onpoli
author: l_stone

text: All good Evan!!! Shut happens!
author: l_stone

text: Whoops, just noticed the typo!
author: l_stone

text: And @AndreaHorwath scrumming with @RSJnow as well
author: l_stone

text: Here’s ⁦@Sflecce⁩ doing a scrum with ⁦@RSJnow⁩ students at Queen’s Park #onpoli
author: l_stone

text: Responding to this, @AndreaHorwath calls it “patently untrue,” says party officials will send out information to prove her (up to) $800 fundraiser was posted within the rules #onpoli
author: l_stone

text: .@TarasNatyshak asks @fordnation if removed @randyhillier as a “revenge plot.” Ford calls the allegations ridiculous, then again attacks the NDP for their fundraiser - after the PC Party recently held a $1,250 a plate fundraiser (as well as a $25 spaghetti dinner)
author: l_stone

text: Now @fordnation says @TarasNatyshak is acting “like a big tough guy” and a coward for not making specific allegations of illegal lobbying outside the House.
author: l_stone

text: This is what ⁦@fordnation⁩ was referring to when he alleged NDP “broke the law” by posting info about their fundraiser on Saturday - from the Elections Finances ACT #onpoli
author: l_stone

text: “Nobody has to pay to have access to Doug Ford,” the Premier says, to jeers from the opposition.
author: l_stone

text: Ford then alleges the NDP “broke the law” by sending out the fundraiser mailing so close to the date (unclear what he’s referring to here.)
author: l_stone

text: Horwath says there is a difference between illegal and legal lobbying; Ford says the $800 price tag is to celebrate Horwath’s 10 years as NDP leader and looks forward to her 20 year anniversary as opposition leader.
author: l_stone

text: After a round of Qs on education, @AndreaHorwath asks about @randyhillier claims of possible illegal and unregistered lobbying; @fordnation counters with an attack on an upcoming NDP $800 fundraiser and “access to her Highness.” I believe Ford just withdrew that comment #onpoli
author: l_stone

text: First Q from @AndreaHorwath about education cuts - @fordnation says the govt is “modernizing education” and not one teacher will lose their job (teachers unions disagree)
author: l_stone

text: .@randyhillier, who yesterday came out swinging after being ousted from caucus, is not here #onpoli
